item.title: What is SantriCyber?
item.description: HALLO! Before i start let me introduce myself, My name is Dimas Setiyadi, 27 years old, i graduated from faculty of Informatics Engineering University of Nusa Mandiri, in this year. And earlier this year 2023 i will to continue studying Mastering of Informatic Engineering at IPB University…Inshaa Allah ðŸ˜„ My technical work spans programming languages, virtual machines, deployment tools, and Internet networking skills. currently my top priority is to be putting together research for my Master Degree of Informatic Engineering further education and then i’m focusing to developing mobile application and learn flutter programming language.
